titleStmt.title: Three letters to the author of a book, entituled The Lord's day vindicated, or The first day of the week the Christian Sabbath together with animadversions on a railing pamphlet, entituled The sauciness of a seducer rebuked, or, The pride and folly of an ignorant scribler made manifest / by Edmund Elys ...
titleStmt.author: Elys, Edmund, ca. 1634-ca. 1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
